bill_title: increase the penalties for certain trespassing offenses.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to increase the penalties for certain trespassing offenses. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 41-9-1 be amended to read as follows: 41-9-1. Except as provided in § 41-9-2, no person may fish, hunt, or trap upon any other person's private land not his own or in his possession without permission from the owner or lessee of such land. A violation of this section is a Class 2 Class 1 misdemeanor and is subject to § 41-9-8. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
